answerText: Frankie "Machine" Majcinek [accept any underlined portion][10] Frankie Machine is the main character of this author's The Man with the Golden Arm. This author also wrote A Walk on the Wild Side.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 12 | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character murders Nifty Louie, his morphine supplier, and gets his friend Sparrow Saltskin to help him cover up the murder. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character, a Chicagoan card dealer who is married to Sophie but has an affair with Molly Novotny.
